"A Great Place to Live" SINCE 1951

Thank you to our residents, Mayor, Council Members, City Secretary, City Hall staff, Public Works staff, Edgecliff Fire Department staff and Volunteers for making the Town of Edgecliff Village,3rd City in the United States for "Best City to Live" in 2022, according to The New York Times.

NEW! Online Payment is available for Edgecliff Village.

To pay water bills for Edgecliff Village, register a customer portal using your email and utility account number for easy access to payment and account details.

Apply Here For Bank Draft

The Town of Edgecliff Village is currently conducting meter upgrades *Note this may cause issues with billing, if you notice any discrepancies please contact City Hall ASAP.

Bill Payment Deadline

Bill Payment Deadline

Please remember to pay your bill before, or on the first working day after the 16th of each month before 4:30 P.M. CT to avoid a $20.00 penalty. To avoid water service interruption, please submit payment BEFORE 4:30 P.M. CT on the last business day of the month.

Bill Payment Deadline

Bank drafts are pulled two business days before the due date to ensure timely payment.

Cash payments will ONLY be accepted in person inside City Hall. We will not be responsible for cash, blank checks, or blank money orders deposited in the drop box.
